name: Justin Pearson
description:
'''Justin Pearson''' (born August 20, 1975) is an American musician and record label owner, known for being the vocalist and bassist in a number of San Diegoâ€“based [[noise rock]], [[Punk rock|punk]] and [[powerviolence]] bands, as well as running his record label [[Three One G Records]]. Starting off in the punk outfit Struggle in 1994, ensuing projects such as [[Swing Kids (band)|Swing Kids]], [[The Locust]], [[Dead Cross]] and [[Retox (band)|Retox]]. He has collaborated with [[Kool Keith]], [[Gabe Serbian]], [[Karen O]], [[Nick Zinner]], [[Adam Gnade]], [[Invisibl Skratch Piklz]], [[Asia Argento]], [[The Bloody Beetroots]], Silent, among many others.

Pearson has been cited as an influence for his work in Swing Kids and The Locust on the genres of [[noise rock]] and [[powerviolence]].
